title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: FARMER ASKED THE ECO ORGANIC MANURE ?

records.KccAns: --Apply Atrazine @ 0.25 kg/ha as pre-emergence on 3-5 DAS using

records.QueryText: Where to contact the purchase of  power weeder
WEATHER FORECAST IN WEST MEDINIPUR  DISTRICT AT KESHPUR BLOCK .
records.KccAns: WEATHER FORECAST IN WEST MEDINIPUR  DISTRICT AT KESHPUR BLOCK  - THERE IS  LOW TO MEDIUM  RAINFALL IN THE NEXT FIVE DAYS BUT PARTLY CLOUDY WEATHER WILL REMAIN. TODAY'S EXPECTED MAXIMUM TEMPERATURE IS ( 27°C AND MINIMUM TEMPERATURE OF 22.°C AND WIND SPEED IS LIKELY TO RUN AT  11 KILOMETRES PER HOUR).  AND AVOID IRRIGATION AS PER THE WEATHER FORECAST.

records.QueryText: information regarding new variety of wheat ?
Brown plant hopper in Paddy fields
records.KccAns: Recommended to spray Pymetrozine 50%WG @ 120gm per acre(9gm/15 liter water) at the base of plant to control Brown plant hopper in Paddy fields.

Weather forecast in Kendrapara district at Derabish block
records.KccAns: Weather forecast in Kendrapara district at Derabish block=There is heavy rainfall in 9th and 10th November .Tomorrow's maximum temperature is 29°C and minimum 22°C and wind speed is likely run at 15Km/Hr.Don't go for harvesting.

records.QueryText: Weather forecast in Kalahandi district at Lanjigarh block
records.KccAns: Weather forecast in Kalahandi district at Lanjigarh block=There is no rainfall in the next 3 days but partly cloudy weather will remain.Tomorrow's maximum temperature is 29°C and minimum 16°C and wind speed is likely run at 7Km/Hr.Go for harvesting accordingly.
